Question.txt: Why hello there! What can I help you with ?

Conversation.Answer: I am Bostof. Son of the great tribal leader Hernandez the Second. Pleased to meet you.
This village is my home, I would never live anywhere else. Personally, I think this is one of the better islands in the region. Best craftsmen in the area, in my opinion.

Question.txt: I work at the markets to earn my keep. Times are tough here since the Huhuloa tribe came in here and claimed all our keep.
Question.reply: Could I buy some of your products ?
Tell me about the Huhuloa tribe
Question.Answer: I would rather not talk about that right now..
